result.title: Invitation to CodeChef's March 2015 Lunch time contest
result.content:
Hi,

I cordially invite all of you in CodeChef's march lunchtime contest for the year 2015. This is a short contest of 3 hours duration starting at 1100 Hrs IST on March 29th 2015 (Check your time zone).. The contest will consist of 4 problems with varying difficulty aimed at providing fun and learning opportunities to middle and high school students. This will be IOI style contest i.e. the problems will be partially graded. Problems are created by Piyush Kumar (2014 ICPC World finalist from India) and I.

Everyone is invited to participate. There are prizes for top Indian students as well as for top global students.

Contest Link

Happy Coding, we hope you have fun solving the problems. Cheers.
